publication.title: Generalization of functional equation for the square root spiral
A New Direct Anonymous Attestation Scheme from Bilinear Maps
publication.keyword: Bilinear Map;Security Requirements;Trusted Computing Platform;Trusted Platform Module;Direct Anonymous Attestation;decisional diffie hellman;Trusted Computing Group;
publication.abstract: The Direct Anonymous Attestation scheme was proposed by Brickell, Jan Camenisch,Liqun Chen and was adopted by the Trusted Computing Group in its specifications for trusted computing platforms. In this paper, We propose a new direct anonymous scheme from the bilinear maps based on the decisional Diffie- Hellman assumption and q-SDH assumption.
